snippet: A 33-year-old woman was reportedly arrested in Damascus on Sunday as she protested outside the Syrian Parliament building with a banner that read, "Stop the killing, so we can build a country for all Syrians."
abstract: A 33-year-old woman was reportedly arrested in Damascus on Sunday as she protested outside the Syrian Parliament building with a banner that read, "Stop the killing, so we can build a country for all Syrians."

headline.main: Syrian Reportedly Detained for Bold Protest
